name: George
description: George is basically a giant puppy with armor plating. He loves to go for walks and play in the snow.

name: Melody
description: True to her name, Melody loves to sing. She is happiest when sitting on a toadstool.

name: Mr. Wiggles
description: Would you love me if I were a worm? Mr. Wiggles has a lot of love to give, and all he asks in return is some fresh dirt.

name: Bethany
description: Bethany loves to watch moovies. Her favourite is Chicken Run.

name: Ferdinand
description: Ferdinand is a gentle giant. He's secretly in love with Bethany.

name: Gary
description: Gary is from the Galapagos, or so we're told. He loves to sun-bathe.

name: Sparky
description: Sparky loves to chew on cables. It's probably best you keep him out of the computer room.

name: Her Highness
description: Her Highness runs the place. She spends all day grooming her luxurious fur and surveying her kingdom.

name: Peter Barker
description: Peter Barker has so much energy that he practically climbs the walls. However, he's good cuddler at bedtime.

name: Atsuko
description: Atsuko is a big fan of shiny objects. We recommend locking away your valuables.

name: GR3-G
description: GR3-G is a great companion and an even better vacuum. They might be past their warranty, but their charm will never expire.

name: Dr. Diabolical
description: Dr. Diabolical is a menace. But who could resist that face?
